reviewtext: When PalmPilots were the rage, this folding keyboard was cool. It was designed well and worked flawlessly. Only it came out just when PalmPilots were about to disappear from visible use.  Looking back at it, there was some irony in using a full keyboard like this just to create long documents in the device that could then be loaded at a later time to a PC and sent in an email.  At the same time, it was easier than carrying around a laptop.  Looking back at the intended use, one didn't expect to be able always to send a document immediately as has long ago become the norm.
